title: Arthritis And Exercise
content:
* Lifts your confidence and self-esteem.
  * Helps with weight management.
  * Promotes good heart and lung health.
  * Lowers [blood pressure](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/b/blood-pressure) and [cholesterol](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/c/cholesterol-what-is).
  * Helps manage blood glucose levels ([diabetes](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/d/diabetes))
  * Improves strength and balance.
  * Gives you more energy.
  * Improves memory and cognitive function.
  * Helps maintain a healthy brain.
  * Delays the onset of neurodegenerative disorders, eg, [dementia](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/d/dementia).
  * Promotes healthy ageing.


The best kind of physical activity for you depends on your [arthritis](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/a/arthritis-an-introduction "Arthritis") and which joints and muscles are affected. 
#### Why isn't everyone with arthritis exercising?
The top 7 concerns the Arthritis NZ educators hear from people with arthritis are:
  1. [I am afraid exercise will make my pain worse or aggravate my condition.(external link)](https://www.arthritis.org.nz/i-am-afraid-exercise-will-make-my-pain-worse-or-aggravate-my-condition/ "Open external link")
  2. [I don’t know what to do or how to get started.(external link)](https://www.arthritis.org.nz/i-dont-know-what-to-do-or-how-to-get-started-with-exercise/ "Open external link")
  3. [I lack the motivation to do it on my own.(external link)](https://www.arthritis.org.nz/i-lack-the-motivation-to-exercise-on-my-own/ "Open external link")
  4. [It is hard to get going when I am in pain.(external link)](https://www.arthritis.org.nz/?s=It+is+hard+to+get+going+when+I+am+in+pain "Open external link")
  5. [I don’t have the time.(external link)](https://www.arthritis.org.nz/i-dont-have-time-for-exercise/ "Open external link")
  6. [I don’t have the energy when I feel tired.(external link)](https://www.arthritis.org.nz/i-dont-have-energy-to-exercise-when-i-feel-tired/ "Open external link")
  7. [I have tried before and didn’t stick with it.(external link)](https://www.arthritis.org.nz/i-have-tried-an-exercise-routine-before-and-didnt-stick-with-it/ "Open external link")


Click on the links above to learn more about how to manage these concerns from Arthritis NZ. 
####  What are the different types of exercise and why are they important? 
**Understanding the 4 different types of exercise is important in determining which types of exercise could be suited to you.
